page.title: 18FORTON PUBS
page.content: {NEW HOLLY}The New Holly is along Lancaster road, which is really the A6. They own a field next door which people caravan or camp on. At the front there are benches for you to sit on outside in Summer or any other time. The pub is owned by Pat and Tony Kingsten. Four men work there including in the kitchen and behind the bar and seven women. They have two strips of horse brasses on the wall. They do bed and breakfast and there are five bedrooms. The favorite drink for the men is beer and for women it is lager. The favourite food for men and women is chips,peas and steak and kidney pie. There is one pool table. There is a cocktail bar and one middle bar for playing pool and a tap room,a front dining room and kitchens for making the food.
